elementary.characteristics: Simple vocabulary, concrete concepts, basic operations, visual learning

middle.characteristics: Moderate vocabulary, abstract thinking, multi-step problems, developing reasoning

high.characteristics: Advanced vocabulary, critical thinking, complex analysis, independent reasoning

mathematics.elementary: Basic arithmetic, simple word problems with pictures
mathematics.middle: Multi-step problems, beginning algebra, geometric concepts
mathematics.high: Advanced algebra, calculus concepts, complex problem solving

science.elementary: Observation-based questions, simple experiments, basic concepts
science.middle: Hypothesis formation, data analysis, scientific method
science.high: Complex experiments, scientific reasoning, research analysis

english.elementary: Vocabulary, simple reading comprehension, basic grammar
english.middle: Literary analysis, essay writing, advanced grammar
english.high: Critical analysis, research papers, advanced composition

social_studies.elementary: Timeline activities, map skills, community helpers
social_studies.middle: Historical analysis, geographic reasoning, civic understanding
social_studies.high: Historical synthesis, political analysis, economic understanding

quality_standards.Content Accuracy: Information must be factually correct and age-appropriate
quality_standards.Grade Appropriateness: Language and concepts must match target grade cognitive level
quality_standards.Question Quality: Questions should be clear, unambiguous, and well-constructed
quality_standards.Difficulty Progression: Appropriate challenge level for each grade without being overwhelming
quality_standards.Educational Value: Clear learning objectives and meaningful assessment
quality_standards.Clarity: Instructions and questions must be easy to understand
quality_standards.Engagement: Content should be interesting and relevant to students
quality_standards.Completeness: Comprehensive coverage of key concepts from source material
quality_standards.Assessment Alignment: Questions should align with grade-level educational standards
